immediate_action: SGD SIMULATION COMPLETE: 84% convergence to rank-1 solutions from random init. The implicit bias is real and measurable. Next: 1) Deep linear networks - do chains of matrices show same bias toward low-rank? Gunasekar et al 2017 on matrix factorization might be the one.
